name: Duck platformer game
description:
This was a game created for a project focusing on the creation of a 2D style game. It's a simple demo of a bigger idea for the project.

~[ Controls ]~

WASD/Arrow keys to move and the space bar to jump

~[ Basic premise ]~

A mysterious goose has stolen one of the magical books from Stanley duck's book collection in the dead of night and vanished beyond the grasslands. Stanley duck now has to chase after the goose to try to reclaim the book in a 2D platformer adventure game.
